tag_list: startups, bloggers, blogs, social-media, consultancy, entrepreneurship
overview:
One of the very first bloggers from Pakistan with expertise in Startups.

Sardar Mohkim Khan has been an active blogger since 2007 and has been associated to one of the most prominent blogs, Startup Meme. His primary interest has been to learn everything about startups, from elevator pitches to how ideas are turned into profitable services and business. He has shared via his blogging over 1,300 startups.

He also contributes regularly to Arctic Startups, a blog focused on the Nordic and Baltic Startup scene. He has been in Broadcast media as an Associate Producer for Pakistan’s first English Language News Channel, Dawn News TV.

Presently Sardar is working as a Business Consultant in one of the leading software and digital media agency in Pakistan and is hard at work to push forth the Startup Scene in Pakistan with Engine 021 by building collaborations with the International Startup Community.

degrees.subject: Advance Communication Systems
degrees.institution: S.S University of Engineering and Technology
